text: (Kare wa) anata gata no tame ni daichi o fushido to shi, mata ōzora o tengai to sa re, ten kara ame o furase, anata gata no tame ni kate to shite shuju no kajitsu o minora se rareru katadearu. Dakara anata gata wa (shinri o) shitta-jō wa,(yuiitsu naru) arrā no soto ni onajiyōna-shin ga aru nado to tonaete wa naranai
